label_saisie: Enter the value to convert and the source base.
a_propos_texte: This software was developed to make conversion between different number bases easier.
erreur_base:
Warning! Your input is invalid for the selected base!
Click 'Clear' to restart!
note_valeur_negative:
Note: This application is intended for computing use only
and does not handle values mathematically.
Negative values are not supported.
message_effacer:
Choose the base, enter your value, and click the 'Convert' button
Or paste a value using the button on the left.
